an8.50:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato matugamo idhalokavijayaya patipanno hoti, ayamsa loko araddho hoti.
an8.50:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, matugamo susamvihitakammanto hoti, sangahitaparijano, bhattu manapam carati, sambhatam anurakkhati.
an8.50:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, matugamo ye te bhattu abbhantara kammanta …pe…
an8.50:2.3: evam kho, bhikkhave, matugamo susamvihitakammanto hoti.
an8.50:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, matugamo yo so bhattu abbhantaro antojano …pe…
an8.50:3.3: evam kho, bhikkhave, matugamo sangahitaparijano hoti.
an8.50:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, matugamo bhattu manapam carati?
an8.50:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, matugamo yam bhattu amanapasankhatam tam jivitahetupi na ajjhacarati.
an8.50:4.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, matugamo bhattu manapam carati.
an8.50:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, matugamo yam bhatta aharati …pe…
an8.50:5.3: evam kho, bhikkhave, matugamo sambhatam anurakkhati.
an8.50:5.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato matugamo idhalokavijayaya patipanno hoti, ayamsa loko araddho hoti.
an8.50:6.1: Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato matugamo paralokavijayaya patipanno hoti, paraloko araddho hoti.
an8.50:6.3: Idha, bhikkhave, matugamo saddhasampanno hoti, silasampanno hoti, cagasampanno hoti, pannasampanno hoti.
an8.50:7.3: evam kho, bhikkhave, matugamo saddhasampanno hoti.
an8.50:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, matugamo panatipata pativirato hoti …pe…
an8.50:8.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, matugamo silasampanno hoti.
an8.50:9.2: Idha, bhikkhave, matugamo vigatamalamaccherena cetasa agaram ajjhavasati …pe…
an8.50:9.3: evam kho, bhikkhave, matugamo cagasampanno hoti.
an8.50:10.3: evam kho, bhikkhave, matugamo pannasampanno hoti.
an8.50:10.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato matugamo paralokavijayaya patipanno hoti, paraloko araddho hotiti.
